A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While die hard fans with high expectations will likely experience their first viewing of \"The Last Jedi\" with harsh disappointment\, I truly believe in time it will be looked as one of the most pivotal and sophisticated films in the Star Wars Saga. Rain Johnson has subverted the formula we've come to know with bold storytelling choices\, dramatic weight\, and seismic shifts of expectation - which to me\, sounds like a pretty great Star Wars movie.
